name: Color Collect
description:
Catch only the balls with the right colors.

Don't let balls drop out of the screen, but bounce them with your paddle.

* Endless game mode to achieve your highscore and post it to Google Play

* Lots of levels with individual goals and difficulties

* Balls are colliding and bouncing with real physics behind

* Addictive and easy game play

* Nice music and sound effects

* Brand new Indie Game

* Lots of additional stuff and special items to come !

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CREDITS

* Contains Music by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) and Snabisch

* No balls were harmed during the production of this game

* https://www.facebook.com/Color-Collect-1799394966942721/
